name: full-stack-open-part3
description: This application contains solutions to the exercises of part 3 of the Full Stack Open course

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../full-stack-open/part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r build ../../../full-stack-open-part3/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m 'build: update ui' && git push

author: Hashir Ahmad
